description: Having opened this restaurant some ten years ago, owner-chef Fabio draws on all his experience from working at various Michelin-starred restaurants during his career. Using regional produce and local recipes, this technically adept chef creates delicious dishes with an imaginative twist, all accompanied by a discreet choice of wines.
